snippet: A number of other Democrats may be possible contenders for the late Representative Donald M. Payne’s seat, including the Assembly speaker and Mr. Payne’s son.
abstract: Death of Rep Donald M Payne of New Jersey, a Democrat and significant force in Newark politics for decades, is expected to set off a major battle for his seat.
lead_paragraph: A number of other Democrats may be possible contenders for the late Representative Donald M. Payne’s seat, including the Assembly speaker and Mr. Payne’s son.

headline.seo: Representative Donald M. Payne’s Death May Set Off Fight Over Successor
headline.main: Lawmaker’s Death May Bring Battle for Successor
headline.print_headline: Lawmaker’s Death May Bring Battle for Seat
